en.name: Islam Elsayed
en.heroDesc: Full Stack Solutions Architect with 13+ years of experience designing and developing high-performance enterprise systems. Specialized in modern full stack technologies such as React, Node.js, .NET Core, and Python, with advanced expertise in cross-platform mobile development using React Native and Flutter. Strong background in building government and banking systems, AI integration, and leading teams to deliver complex technical projects.
